channel.title: Demo Site (nikola)
channel.description: This is a demo site for Nikola.

item.title: Improving vIPer slideshows styling
item.description:
The last weekend, I had some time to improve the styling of the slideshow view (of the IPython notebook) rendered by vIPer.

Read more...

item.title: Nikola + nbconvert
item.description:
Importing a static view (rendered by nbconvert) of one IPython example notebook into a nikola blog post:

.. raw:: html
   :file: /home/damian/Desarrollos/Sitios/Damian_blog_nikola/files/Test.html

It works! You can see below... the themes will be available soon.

Damián.

item.title: Powered by Nikola...
item.description:
Nikola is a static site generator created by a member of the PyAr community (Roberto Alsina). It is a great project and the pythonic-way I choose to blog again...
